mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
INSERT INTO `bw_data` ( `tid`, `aid` , `v_year`, `v_pic`, `v_name`, `v_spell`, `v_letter`, `v_nickname`, `v_enname`, `v_publishyear`, `v_publishcompany`, `v_showbox`, `v_publisharea`, `v_videoarea`, `v_videotime`, `v_ontime`, `v_offtime`, `v_director`, `v_writer`, `v_producer`, `v_type`, `v_actor`, `v_total`, `v_length`, `v_boxoffice`, `v_language`, `v_color`, `v_imdb`, `v_perlength`, `v_presenter`, `v_onlineshow`, `v_tvshow`, `v_drama`, `v_description`, `v_state`, `v_score`, `v_scorenum`, `v_doubanscore`, `v_mtimescore`, `v_imdbscore`, `v_meituanscore`, `v_note`, `v_tags`, `v_isunion`,`v_cycle`, `v_ver`, `v_remark`, `v_digg`, `v_rank`, `v_hit`, `v_dayhit`, `v_weekhit`, `v_monthhit`, `v_hittime`, `v_daytime`, `v_weektime`, `v_monthtime`, `v_createtime`, `v_updatetime`, `v_source`) VALUES ( #{data.tId}, #{data.aId}, #{data.vYear}, #{data.vPic}, #{data.vName}, #{data.vSpell}, #{data.vLetter}, #{data.vNickName}, #{data.vEnName}, #{data.vPublishYear}, #{data.vPublishCompany}, #{data.vShowBox}, #{data.vPublishArea}, #{data.vVideoArea}, #{data.vVideoTime}, #{data.vOnTime}, #{data.vOffTime}, #{data.vDirector}, #{data.vWriter}, #{data.vProducer}, #{data.vType}, #{data.vActor}, #{data.vTotal}, #{data.vLength}, #{data.vBoxOffice}, #{data.vLanguage}, #{data.vColor}, #{data.vImdb}, #{data.vPerLength}, #{data.vPresenter}, #{data.vOnlineShow}, #{data.vTvShow}, #{data.vDrama}, #{data.vDescription}, #{data.vState}, #{data.vScore}, #{data.vScoreNum}, #{data.vDoubanScore}, #{data.vmTimeScore}, #{data.vImdbScore}, #{data.vMeituanScore}, #{data.vNote}, #{data.vTags}, #{data.vIsUnion},#{data.vCycle}, #{data.vVer}, #{data.vRemark}, #{data.vDigg}, #{data.vRank}, #{data.vHit}, #{data.vDayHit}, #{data.vWeekHit}, #{data.vMonthHit}, #{data.vHitTime}, #{data.vDayTime}, #{data.vWeekTime}, #{data.vMonthTime}, #{data.vCreateTime}, #{data.vUpdateTime}, #{data.vSource});
